headline: Portillo's: Units Of The Future Are Coming Out Of The Oven, But I'm Hoping For A Greater Margin Of Safety
summary: Portillo's lacks a loyalty program and value platform, leading to a -0.9% decline in comparable sales and a 3.5% drop in traffic in Q3 FY 2024. Learn more on PTLO stock here.

headline: Yum! Brands Declares Quarterly Dividend of $0.67 Per Share
summary: LOUISVILLE, Ky-Yum! Brands, Inc. Board of Directors declared a dividend of $0.67 per share of common stock. The quarterly dividend will be distributed December 13, 2024 to shareholders of record at...

headline: 'You're Hired': How Yum! Brands Is Preparing Tomorrow's Global Workforce
summary: * The world's largest restaurant company has prioritized career readiness, working with local charities to unlock job opportunities for youth, both inside and outside of Yum!'s restaurants, to ensure...
